name: AMS Food Bank
description: The AMS Food Bank provides confidential, non-judgmental food service to Queen's University students. We aim to ensure that students can stay healthy and focus on their academic potential.
address: John Deutsch University Centre (JDUC), Room 343, 99 University Ave, Kingston, ON K7L 3N6
synthetic_queries: I am a student at Queen's and I ran out of grocery money
